message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SI 

This paper discusses the use of federated learning in mobile networks and proposes a scheme for selecting reliable workers based on reputation management using blockchain. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning) as the paper focuses on improving the performance of federated learning. The paper also discusses the issue of frauds in federated learning, which falls under the category of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The use of blockchain for reputation management falls under the category of cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The paper also discusses the use of mobile networks, which falls under the category of cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Finally, the paper proposes a scheme for improving the reliability of federated learning tasks, which falls under the category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
